articles.title: Japan Urged to Properly Settle All Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Properly Settle All Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee on Measures for Compensation to Former Korean Sexual Slaves for Japanese Army and Victims of Forcible Drafting Friday made public a statement branding the suppression of the March First Popular Uprising by the Japanese imperialists as massacres aimed at exterminating the Korean nation.
					 On March 1, 1919, the Japanese imperialists brutally killed Koreans who turned out in a peaceful demonstration in protest against the colonial rule and in demand of the independence of the country. 
					
					 They massacred more than 100,000 Koreans during the uprising, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 There were many cases of mass killing including the cases of the March First Popular Uprising, the great Kanto quake and Ukishima-maru sinking by explosion and forcible drafting, forced labor and sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. However, Japan has neither made any sincere apology for the crimes committed by it against Koreans in the past nor probed the truth behind those crimes. 
					
					 In recent years alone, the Japanese chief executive blustered that there is no evidence proving that the Imperial Japanese Army forcibly drafted women as comfort women. In January this year the new president of NHK justified the shuddering sexual slavery, claiming that there were comfort women in any country which fought a war.
					
					 A hundred and dozens of politicians thronged to the Yasukuni Shrine to honor the memory of those war criminals who imposed horrible disasters upon the Korean people and others in Asia. They even let loose absurd sophism that there is still no clear definition about aggression worldwide, stunning the international community. 
					
					 What is happening in Japan reminds people of its real picture in those days before its defeat when it frantically rode on a chariot of imperialism, advertising its war of aggression as a "war of justice" obsessed with the daydream of "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere". 
					
					 Japan should never forget that if it lends no ear to the voices of justice, persisting in its anachronistic moves to evade the settlement of its past crimes and distort history, it will throw itself and people into the abyss of ruin again. 
					
					 Japan had better drop its wrong view on history and way of thinking, though belatedly, and opt for honestly paying for all losses and sufferings it brought to Korea and its people and other peoples of Asia.

articles.title: National Meeting Observes Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work
articles.content:
National Meeting Observes Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture Friday to mark the 50th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "Theses on the Socialist Rural Question in Our Country".
					 Kim Il Sung made public the socialist rural theses on Feb. 25, Juche 53 (1964), thus comprehensively clarifying the essence of the socialist rural question, the basic principles for its solution and main tasks and ways for successfully carrying out the rural construction for the first time in history.
					
					 Thanks to the rural theses, the Korean people could dynamically push forward the socialist rural construction on the basis of a clear-cut blueprint for successfully settling the rural question to suit the specific conditions of the DPRK without facing slight turns, twists and deviations and despite all sorts of abuses by the imperialists and global political upheaval.
					
					 Present there were senior party and state officials, officials of the party and power bodies, ministries including the Ministry of Agriculture and national institutions, meritorious persons and officials and workers of organs, industrial establishments and co-op farms in Pyongyang.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the DPRK, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said the theses which comprehensively deal with the President's far-reaching plan for rural construction and wealth of experience gained by him in carrying it out serve as an immortal programme for socialist rural construction as they help firmly consolidate the rural position and rapidly develop the nation's agriculture.
					
					 He referred to the eye-opening changes and great successes made in settling the rural question under the wise leadership of the party and the leader for the past 50 years since the publication of the theses.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il published immortal works related to the matters of peasants and agriculture and laid down judicious policies in every period of the developing revolution, thus clarifying with lucidity all difficult and complicated issues arising in the rural construction.
					
					 The rural areas in the country where once centuries-old backwardness and poverty prevailed have a scientific foundation and material and technical potentials capable of steadily boosting agricultural productivity thanks to the state support and strong backing of industry. This is a striking demonstration of the wise leadership provided by the party and the leader for thoroughly implementing the theses.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il energetically led the efforts to raise the cultural standard of the peasants and build rural villages into highly civilized socialist ones good to live in.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of the party and the leader, Chongsan-ri Spirit and Chongsan-ri Method have been fully applied to the guidance over agriculture and a system was established, whereby the co-op farm management committee of a county guides co-op farms in an industrial method and on a sci-tech basis.
					
					 The idea and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il have been successfully carried forward under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un set agriculture as a major thrust of the drive for building an economic power and improving the people's standard of living and has brought about a new leap forward and innovations in agriculture through his energetic leadership.
					
					 The reporter underlined the need to bring about fresh progress in finally settling the rural question by thoroughly implementing the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his letter to the participants in the national conference of subworkteam leaders in the agricultural sector "Let Us Bring About Innovations in Agricultural Production under the Unfurled Banner of the Socialist Rural Theses".

articles.title: Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., Journalists Union of Korea Held
articles.content:
Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., Journalists Union of Korea Held
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- There took place an enlarged plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea here on Thursday.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, members of the C.C., the Journalists Union of Korea, leading officials, journalists and editors of the media organs in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 The meeting underscored the need for the media persons to successfully fulfill their mission and duty as buglers for advance in the drive for raising a strong wind of a great leaping forward on all fronts of building a thriving nation through a revolutionary ideological offensive.
					
					 Cha Sung Su, chairman of the C.C., Journalists Union, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the speech made by Marshal Kim Jong Un at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea serves as a great programme for media persons and an all-powerful treasured sword for fully ensuring the victory of the Korean revolution by dint of ideology.
					
					 They underlined the need for the media persons to kindle a torch in the field of media and stage an intensive media offensive, information and agitation campaigns, bearing deep in mind the intention of Kim Jong Un to bring earlier the final victory of the revolution by holding more tightly the powerful weapon -- the Juche-oriented theory of ideology. 
					
					 A resolution was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: National Symposium on Medical Science Held
articles.content:
National Symposium on Medical Science Held
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- There took place a national symposium on medical science at the Grand People's Study House on Friday to mark the 35th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "On Developing Traditional Korean Medicine".
					 The work, published on Feb. 27, Juche 68 (1979), is a classical work of historic significance in thoroughly preserving Juche character and national character in healthcare and developing the Korean people's advantageous traditional medicine.
					
					 The work clarifies tasks and ways for developing Koryo medicine on the basis of a scientific analysis of its features and advantages.
					
					 Choe Tuk Ryong, director of the Academy of Koryo Medicine, in a speech made at the symposium called on all public health workers to make an uninterrupted leap forward in the development of Koryo medicine, bearing deep in mind the idea and the spirit of devoted service to the people contained in the work and thus contribute to giving play to the advantages of the socialist healthcare system.
					
					 Then a lecture was given on scientization and modernization of diagnosis based on information about the regions of acupuncture.
					
					 Presented at the symposium were scientific research successes made in the field of Koryo medicine.
					
					 Drawing the attention of the participants were papers contributing to putting the tested principles of Koryo medicine on a scientific basis including those on the study of Kyongrak (channels and collaterals), physical constitution and traditional medicine, and successes made in applying Koryo medicines and acupuncture in the treatment of various diseases, etc.
					
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers and medical workers in the field of public health.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Sports Contest Closes
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Prize Sports Contest was closed with due ceremony at the Ice Rink Friday. It was opened on Feb. 4.
					 At the contest men and women players of the April 25 Sports Team placed first in premier basketball games and premier volleyball matches.
					
					 Men players of the Sports Team of the Ministry of Fisheries and women players of the Taesongsan Sports Team came first in ice hockey events.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, sportspersons and citizens in Pyongyang.
					
					 Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Ri Jong Mu addressed the closing ceremony.

articles.title: Outdoor Solar Lamp System Based on Nano-technology Developed
articles.content:
Outdoor Solar Lamp System Based on Nano-technology Developed
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The 29th Festival of Science and Technology of Kim Chaek University of Technology took place here some days ago.
					 What caught one's eye in the festival was the outdoor solar lamp system based on nano-technology, with its solar battery made in the country.
					
					 In this regard, Kim Yong Jo, a researcher of the Electronics Faculty of the university, told KCNA: 
					
					 The university developed nano-filmed solar battery, which is called second-generation solar battery worldwide, with raw materials available in the country. It also succeeded in putting the production of solar battery on an industrial basis.
					
					 Its production cost is low with technical indexes improved. Its design can be easily altered to suit installation sites.
					
					 The system has been installed in streets, parks and recreation grounds.

articles.title: Production Processes Updated in DPRK's Light Industrial Factories
articles.content:
Production Processes Updated in DPRK's Light Industrial Factories
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Light industrial factories in the DPRK has modernized their production processes.
					 The factories have made big efforts to put their production processes on a CNC basis and place production on a steady basis with locally available raw materials. 
					
					 Textile mills are pressing ahead with the work to replace shuttle looms by rapier looms, while knitwear factories are making efforts to modernize dyeing processes.
					
					 Shoes factories have introduced new injectors to ensure the quality of soles and reinforced single-purpose equipment.
					
					 Textile machine factories are stepping up the work to put machine tools on a CNC basis and develop highly-efficient flexible rapier looms.

articles.title: Amnokgang Sports Team Tops Domestic Table Tennis Rankings
articles.content:
Amnokgang Sports Team Tops Domestic Table Tennis Rankings
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The Amnokgang Sports Team proved successful at the division-1 table-tennis contest of the Paektusan Prize Sports Games held here some days ago.
					 The team bagged five gold medals in men's and women's team events, women's singles and men's and women's doubles.
					
					 The April 25 Sports Team won two gold medals in mixed doubles and men's singles.
					
					 An official of the Table-tennis Association told KCNA:
					
					 The April 25 Sports Teams had been the national table-tennis champion. Men's and women's team events and men's singles remained its exclusive property in particular.
					
					 It took 8 years for the Amnokgang Sports Team to win back the domestic table-tennis championship after its victory at the DPRK Championships in Juche 95 (2006).

articles.title: DPRK Acrobatic Feat Wins Gold Elephant Prize
articles.content:
DPRK Acrobatic Feat Wins Gold Elephant Prize
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK physical acrobatics "A horizontal bar and flying on trapeze" was awarded the Gold Elephant prize, the top prize of the 3rd Figueras International Circus Festival hosted by Spain from Feb. 20 to 24.
					 The festival brought together famous circuses and acrobats from 14 countries including the DPRK, China, Russia, Mongolia, the U.S., Brazil and Chile.
					
					 Korean acrobats admirably displayed high skills and flip-flaps.
					
					 They returned home on Friday.

articles.title: 7th Conference of WPK Ideological Officials
articles.content:
7th Conference of WPK Ideological Officials
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The 7th Conference of Ideological Officials of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), held here in February Juche 93 (2004), was of significance in glorifying the undying feats of leader Kim Jong Il, who set forth the unique line of giving priority to ideology and guided the revolution and construction to victory, and providing a milestone for fresh advance in the efforts to build a thriving nation by dint of ideology as well as the army.
					 The conference discussed the matters of brining a radical turn in the party ideological work as required by the era of Songun (military-first) by inheriting the tradition of victories won in the struggle for socialist construction and defence of the country under the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 After the conference, the trait of giving priority to ideology has been thoroughly established in the whole party and all the party organizations and officials have turned out in the ideological work to cement the politico-ideological position, the lifeline of the Korean revolution, as firm as rock.
					
					 The monolithic ideology and guidance of the leader was fully established within the WPK and it strengthened into a revolutionary party with a strong sense of organization and discipline and a motherly party that struck its roots deep among the popular masses, taking care of their destinies in a responsible manner.
					
					 All the members of society grew up to be true revolutionaries in the era of Songun and the single-minded unity of the leader, party, army and people was further consolidated. And the army-people unity in idea and working traits was ensured and the revolutionary ranks became elite and powerful.
					
					 A publicity and agitation offensive was launched to carry into practice the WPK's plan for building an economic power, thus effecting a great revolutionary upswing in the whole country.

articles.title: KCNA Hits CI's "Report"
articles.content:
KCNA Hits CI's "Report"
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The Commission of Inquiry (CI) on the human rights situations in the DPRK, organized under the UN Human Rights Council, has recently released a "report".
					 The "report" misrepresents the true picture of the DPRK people enjoying genuine rights and is peppered with sheer lies and fabrications, deliberately cooked up by such riff-raffs as those who defected from the DPRK and criminals who escaped from it after committing crimes in the country.
					
					 That is why many countries and even Western media have said that the "report" is so biased and has no credibility, querying how such thing could be distributed as a UN document. 
					
					 Russia's Internet magazine Tibilrus said in an article titled "UN Creature" that the "report" was apparently ordered, adding the United Nations damaged its prestige with such absurd and vague document. Questionable is the fact that the "report" was released at a time when the DPRK has exerted much  effort for improved north-south relations and the reunification of the divided country, the article pointed out.
					
					 Jean-Vincent Brisset, an expert at a French institute of strategic studies, said in an interview with the newspaper La Croix that he could hardly recognize the "report" as it is an unscientific document without the confirmation of data. And he stressed that the "report" should, instead, mention how the United States has pursued its hostile policy toward the DPRK and destroyed the gains made between the north and the south of Korea for decades.
					
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, said in a statement titled "Obama's servant invents a Nazi report against the DPRK" carried in the newspaper Hora do Povo:
					
					 Nobody knows Michael Kirby, who would appear abruptly in exclusive reptile media of various countries to make false propaganda against socialist Korea.
					
					 He is likely the chairman of a UN committee on Korean affairs which acts under the U.S. baton. His mission is to make false rumours about the DPRK by concocting "evidences" as demanded by Washington and thus join the U.S.-led international cooperation against the DPRK.
					
					 He has neither been to Pyongyang nor met with government officials of the DPRK.
					
					 But, following without any consideration the Nazi theory that making rounds of lies turns to be truth, he had been invited on many occasions to Seoul where all structures are ready to collect "evidence" needed to work out the "report", a false document, through interviews with south Koreans and some "defectors from the north".
					
					 His Nazist approach towards the DPRK is aimed to paint socialist Korea as the Nazis abusing human rights and sue the DPRK to the International Criminal Court that works for political interests of the U.S. and its allies taking as a target of attack the statesmen of countries which do not follow Neo-liberalism.
					
					 The facts clearly show that the "report" is an extremely dangerous political provocation aimed to undermine the DPRK's social system by defiling its dignified image and tightening pressure upon it. It is an outcome of the U.S. disgusting hostility towards the DPRK that has continued for scores of years.
					
					 The U.S. is a kingpin of human rights violation, which slaughters innocent people, bringing untold disasters through aggression and intervention worldwide.
					
					 It has killed civilians in Iraq, Libya, Afghanistan, Pakistan and other countries and openly supplied weapons to rebel forces in independent countries including Syria, flagrantly violating their sovereignty.
					
					 It operates prisons in different parts of the world, including Guantanamo, maltreating the inmates.
					
					 The U.S., tundra of human rights and a veritable hell, is infamous for systematic worldwide tapping and surveillance.
					
					 Therefore, it is preposterous for the U.S. to talk about other's "human rights violation". 
					
					 The U.S. is the mastermind of worldwide human rights abuses and a special-class human rights abuser that should have been brought to the International Criminal Court.
					
					 The DPRK people will never remain an onlooker to such disgusting deed of slinging mud at the dignity and social system of the DPRK, prompted by inveterate antagonism toward the Korean-style socialism centred on the popular masses.
					
					 The foolish attempt of the hostile forces to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and undermine its socialist system by making a bad use of the human rights issue for insidious political purpose will meet a stern punishment by history.

articles.title: Disappointment Expressed at Present Regime in S. Korea
articles.content:
Disappointment Expressed at Present Regime in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- South Korean civic and public organizations expressed disappointment at the one-year office of the present regime on Tuesday, according to Yonhap News of south Korea. 
					 10 organizations including the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society and the Citizens Federation for Economic Justice held a news conference at Kwanghwamun Square in Seoul. 
					
					 They held that freedom of expression and rights to assembly and demonstration are trampled down by the power and commitments to people's living are forgotten, in fact. 
					
					 The headquarters of the Movement for Democratization of Economy held a news conference near Chongwadae, declaring that even the word "democratization of economy" has disappeared. 
					
					  The Bar Association for Democratic Society held a meeting at a hall in Jongdong to denounce the power bodies' interference in the election, suppression of trade unions and privatization policy. It disclosed that Chongwadae and the Ministry of Justice had persistently disturbed the probe into the truth behind the case of interference in the election. 
					
					 The counter-measure against the Railway Trade Union's strike against privatization was a clear expression of crackdown upon trade unions, it said, adding:
					
					 The regime regarded trade unions as enemy and unhesitatingly cooked up false rumors and fabrications to disband them.
					
					 It reneged on the major commitments to people's living including treatment of the disabled. It is hard to expect the fulfillment of commitments made by the present regime.

articles.title: Punishment of Masterminds of Illegal Interference in Election Demanded
articles.content:
Punishment of Masterminds of Illegal Interference in Election Demanded
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The Pusan Parish Priests Group of the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice held a mass on the situation on Feb. 24 condemning power organs' illegal interference in the election, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo.
					 The religious group in its statement held that what the "government" showed over the past one year was just its moves to evade responsibility for the election rigging and conceal the truth behind it, and its false commitments and suppression of protesters.
					
					 The statement recalled that religionists have staged actions, urging the "government" to make an apology for the fraudulent election, take measures for it and punishing its mastermind.
					
					 However, the "government" disturbed the investigation for probing the truth, threatened people by branding them as " followers of the north", a trite method for crackdown, it noted, deploring the abnormal situation where the court passed a decision of not guilty upon those related to the election rigging case.
					
					 It also labeled media, which speak for the power, shutting their eyes to truth, as the worst conspirator as they reduced society to such a lawless one.
					
					 All fair-minded intellectuals, religionists and people in society will struggle for justice in solidarity in face of the present situation in which justice and conscience are being trampled down, it noted, demanding a severe punishment of those who masterminded the illegal election.

articles.title: Social Democracy Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Social Democracy Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Situation Council to Denounce IS Interference in Presidential Election for Political Operation sponsored a candlelight rally at Seoul Plaza on Feb. 25 at which its participants called for probing the truth behind the fraudulent election with government power involved and for democratization in south Korea.
					 The speakers deplored that no progress has been made in the strenuous actions staged by people of various circles for the past one year in demand of the probe into the truth behind the illegal interference in the election by power organs and punishment of its main culprit. 
					
					 On the contrary, the court is persisting in its actions to judge those related to the case of the Unified Progressive Party although the case was fabricated by the Intelligence Service to conceal the illegal election masterminded by it, they charged.
					
					 They declared all people would turn out in all-out actions in demand of freedom of thought and social democracy, painting south Korea as a lawless land.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Calls for Peace, Reunification
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Calls for Peace, Reunification
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of Movement for Reunified Korean Nation held a regular meeting in Seoul on Feb. 22 at which it declared that it would conduct positive activities for peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula this year, according to the south Korean Internet paper Thongil News.
					 Japan's rearmament and the strengthening of the military cooperation among the U.S., Japan and south Korea are posing a great threat to the peace on the peninsula, it noted, calling for actions against this.
					
					 It will publish and distribute pamphlets dealing with the danger and serious nature of Japan's moves to revive militarism and launch an intensive anti-Japan struggle with August 15 as an occasion.
					
					 The organization declared it would carry on the actions against a war and activities for improving the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked at DPRK Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Celebration events such as receptions, photo and book exhibitions and film shows took place at DPRK missions abroad between February 7 and 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 They included the DPRK missions in Beijing, Shenyang and Hong Kong of China, Cuba, Iran, Malaysia, Uzbekistan, Italy, the Czech Republic, Bulgaria, Guinea, Angola, Egypt and Brazil and the DPRK permanent mission at the UN.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were works of peerlessly great men and photos and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched DPRK documentaries such as "The International Friendship Exhibition House" and "Four Seasons in Pyongyang".
					
					 The vice-minister of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba said that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the building of a thriving nation and the independent peaceful reunification of the country, remaining true to the will of the President.
					
					 The chairperson of the Malaysian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star said that Kim Jong Il passed away in a train coach while devoting his all to the country and people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The chairman of the Italian General Investment Group praised Kim Jong Il as a great man for putting the dignity of the DPRK on the highest level despite the complicated international situation.
					
					 The Guinean minister of Agriculture said that Kim Jong Il was the leader of the world stature who performed immortal exploits for the human cause of independence.
					
					 An Angolan minister said that the great revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il would always go down in history.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed by Russian Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed by Russian Papers
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers and magazines carried special write-ups to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The February 19-25 issue of Pravda Primoriya carried an article titled "Peerless patriot" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il standing together with supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper said in the article:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who was born in Mt. Paektu, holy mountain of the revolution, and grew up, nurturing patriotic soul, led the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK with his extraordinary wisdom and distinguished leadership art, performing immortal exploits to shine for all ages. 
					
					 He also made great contributions to the efforts to accomplish the cause of national reunification and ensuring peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world by steering the trend of the situation on the Korean peninsula and global politics.
					
					 Nizhegorodskaya Pravda on February 13 carried articles with various titles such as "Main force of the revolution" and "Way of prosperity" illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Source of victory" noted that all valuable treasures provided by the Songun politics are reliable assets for the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea, adding that the Songun leadership exploits performed by Kim Jong Il are a source of the DPRK's victory.
					
					 Internet magazines such as Hanber Journal carried special articles titled "Eternal sun of Songun" and "Yearning in February" illustrated with a photo of smiling Kim Jong Il and photos dealing with the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un between February 14 and 16.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Brazilian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Brazilian Figure
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Jose Gil de Almeida, chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK, released a statement titled "Leader Kim Jong Il, tender-hearted father of the people" on February 15 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a tender-hearted father who regarded believing in people as in Heaven as his motto and devoted his all to the people all his life.
					
					 He gave priority to the interests and conveniences of the people and regarded them as absolute, never allowing even the slightest practice contrary to them.
					
					 He regarded the work to improve the people's standard of living as the most important affair and the highest goal of struggle and made ceaseless forced marches for field guidance to bring happiness to the people.
					
					 The ideals of the people were translated into realities everywhere he went.
					
					 He visited the comprehensive base for art information and Kwangbok Area Supermarket just before its opening and worked heart and soul to ensure a highly civilized and bountiful life of the people in the last period of his life.
					
					 He passed away in a train coach due to the excessive mental and physical stress caused by ceaseless journeys made by him for field guidance with his superhuman energy to realize the ideal of the people.
					
					 His majestic image as the tender-hearted father will always be remembered by the Korean people with profound reverence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given in Russia and meetings in France and Venezuela on February 14 and 18 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The chairman of the Council of the "Jongilbong" Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Ulyanovsk Region said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il was a peerless statesman and brilliant Songun commander who put the DPRK on the status of political, ideological and military power.
					
					 He was a great leader who defended the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and made an immortal contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 And he was the father of the nation who provided solid foundations for the building of a thriving socialist nation and devoted his all to the independent peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The vice-president of the France-Korea Friendship Association said:
					
					 H.E. Kim Jong Il performed immortal exploits for ensuring peace and security not only on the Korean peninsula but also in the world.
					
					 He provided north-south summits, bringing about a turning phase in the movement for Korean reunification.
					
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association will continue making positive efforts for the reunification of Korea and the development of relations between the two countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea praised Kim Jong Il's sacred revolutionary career.
					
					 A congratulatory message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Venezuela.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Events were held in foreign countries on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a meeting, round-table talks, seminar and book and photo exhibition in Brazil, Pakistan, Iran and Germany from Feb. 10 to 18.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the prospering DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the Brasilia Federal District Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party lauded the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed by firmly protecting the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation and making a great contribution to the accomplishment of the cause of global independence.
					
					 The general secretary of the Sind State Committee of the Pakistan Awami National Party said that the great exploits performed by Kim Jong Il on behalf of the country, revolution and progressive humankind would always be recorded in history in golden letters.
					
					 The secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan－Korea Friendship Association stressed that Kim Jong Il was an outstanding leader, rare thinker and theoretician and tender-hearted father of the people who achieved the single-minded unity of the party, army and people and dynamically promoted the victorious advance of the cause of global independence.
					
					 The manager of the Iran－Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm said that Kim Jong Il was a great statesman who devoted his all to the happiness of the people and prosperity of the country and that his undying feats would be always remembered by the Korean people.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at events held in Pakistan and Germany.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Foreign media dedicated special articles and programs to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted articles under different titles on its internet website on February 12 illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It said in an article titled "Invincible banner of the cause of independence-Songun" that the world keenly realized Songun is an invincible banner for the cause of independence through the realities in the DPRK in which it has demonstrated its sovereignty and dignity before the whole world while courageously standing in confrontation with the U.S., adding that the validity and might of Songun was clearly proved in the practical course of the Korean revolution.
					
					 An article said under the title "Great man and gifts" that gifts President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received from heads of state and prominent figures of many countries are exhibited in the International Friendship Exhibition House and all visitors expressed admiration for them as the gifts are not only valuable but also profound in meaning.
					
					 The Guinean Domestic Broadcasting Service on February 14 reported that love for people was the core of the noble personality of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Guinean International Broadcasting Service and the Seven National Languages Broadcasting Service aired similar program.
					
					 The Egyptian paper Al-Misaiya on February 14 said in an article titled "Outstanding leadership art" that the international community greatly admires the leadership art of Marshal Kim Jong Un, who has performed great miracles by motivating all the service personnel and people to move as one.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Pakistan, Mongolia and Ukraine from Feb. 6 to 14 to observe the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Reporters and speakers including Javed Ansari, secretary general of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, the general secretary of the Sind State Committee of the Pakistan Awami National Party and Ghulam Rabbani, chairman of the Karachi Juche Study Centre of Pakistan, praised Kim Jong Il as an outstanding thinker and theoretician, peerless statesman, iron-willed brilliant commander, great sage of humankind and genius of creation and construction.
					
					 His great exploits, patriotic enthusiasm and boundless love for the people will always be remembered by all peoples.
					
					 E. Maksim, secretary general of the Mongolian Peace and Solidarity Body, said it is great exploits to go down long in history that Kim Jong Il developed the Juche idea and turned the DPRK into an impregnable socialist fortress.
					
					 He extended full support to the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving nation by firmly adhering to the line of independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence and to reunify the country, guided by the idea of national independence.
					
					 N. Sarantuya, member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, referred in detail to the fact that Kim Jong Il proclaimed the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism 40 years ago.
					
					 The chairperson of the Crimean Association for the Study of the Juche Idea of Ukraine said Kim Jong Il's development of the Songun idea is of world historic significance. The chairperson spoke about Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership feats, the founding of the Songun idea and its essential contents.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at a seminar held in Mongolia.

articles.title: Comite Coreano demanda a Japon liquidar su pasado lleno de  crimenes
articles.content:
Comite Coreano demanda a Japon liquidar su pasado lleno de  crimenes
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Coreano por Medidas sobre el Problema de ex Esclavas Sexuales para el Ejercito Japones y Victimas de Reclutamiento Forzoso publico el dia 28 una declaracion de condena a los imperialistas japoneses que reprimieron el Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo para exterminar a la nacion coreana.
					Con motivo del levantamiento del primero de marzo de 1919, los imperialistas japoneses asesinaron barbaramente a mas de 100 mil coreanos levantados en la manifestacion pacifica contra la dominacion colonial de Japon y en demanda a la independencia del pais, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Hasta la fecha, Japon nunca pidio la sincera disculpa ni aclaro el verdadero aspecto de la represion del dicho levantamiento, la masacre de los coreanos en el gran terremoto de Kanto, el hundimiento del barco "Ukishima-maru" por explosion y otros casos de asesinatos y los crimenes antieticos cometidos en el pasado contra el pueblo coreano, entre otros, el reclutamiento forzoso, el trabajo forzoso, el caso de esclavitud sexual para el ejercito japones.
					
					En los ultimos anos, el mandatario japones dijo abiertamente que "no existe el testigo de que el viejo ejercito japones secuestro a las mujeres para obligarles una vida consoladora". En tanto, en enero del presente ano, el presidente recien nombrado de NHK justifico el crimen de esclavitud sexual diciendo que "habia esclavas sexuales en cualesquier paises beligerantes".
					
					Mas de cien politiqueros visitaron colectivamente el santuario Yasukuni para consolar a los criminales de guerra quienes acarrearon al pueblo coreano y otros asiaticos las calamidades indelebles y soltaron las sofisterias de que en el mundo todavia no esta establecida la definicion sobre la agresion, lo que consterna la sociedad internacional.
					
					La realidad de Japon hace imaginar la figura de este pais en vispera de su derrota, en que enloquecido por la ambicion de realizar la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental", conducia el coche imperialista propagando la guerra de agresion como la "guerra justa".
					
					Japon debe conocer que si no presta oidos a las voces justas recurriendo al anacronico proceder para evadir la liquidacion del pasado y tergiversar la historia, llevara su pais y  nacion al abismo de la destruccion.
					
					El pais isla debe corregir la erronea concepcion de historia y pensamiento y tomar la actitud sincera de liquidar merecidamente todas las calamidades y dolores del pueblo coreanos y los demas asiaticos sufridos en el tiempo pasado por el imperialismo japones.

articles.title: Acto central por 50 aniversario de publicacion de obra de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Acto central por 50 aniversario de publicacion de obra de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 28 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central dedicado al 50o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Presidente Kim Il Sung "Tesis sobre el problema rural socialista en nuestro pais".
					 El Presidente publico el 25 de febrero del 53 (1964) de la Era Juche la tesis sobre el problema rural en que aclaro totalmente por primera vez en la historia la esencia del problema rural socialista, los principios elementales para resolverlo, las tareas principales de la construccion rural y los remedios.
					
					 Asi el pueblo coreano pudo acelerar con energia la construccion rural socialista con el diseno claro capaz de resolver excelentemente el problema rural conforme a la realidad de Corea sin minimos reveses ni una desviacion aun en medio del impedimento de toda indole de los imperialistas y el desorden politico mundial.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y poder, los ministerios inclusive el Ministerio de Agricultura y los organos centrales, los benemeritos, los funcionarios de las granjas cooperativas, instituciones, empresas y fabricas de esta capital y los trabajadores.
					
					  El informe estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  El informante subrayo que la tesis que  sintetiza el gran proyecto del Presidente sobre la construccion rural y sus ricas experiencias es el gran programa de la construccion rural socialista para consolidar la base rural y desarrollar vertiginosamente la agricultura del pais y prosiguio:
					
					  Durante 50 anos despues de publicada la tesis se lograron bajo la direccion del partido y lider un viraje trascendental y gran victoria en la solucion del problema rural.
					
					  El Presidente y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presentaron en cada periodo de la revolucion en desarrollo las obras inmortales y las sabias orientaciones alusivas al problema del campesino y el campo para dilucidar perspicazmente todos los problemas dificiles y complicados surgidos en la construccion rural.
					
					  Nuestro campo donde reinaban solo el atraso secular y la pobreza, llego a disponer una base cientifica y la potencialidad material y tecnica que permite desarrollar constantemente la productividad agricola bajo el apoyo estatal y la activa ayuda de la industria.
					
					  Todo esto se debe a la sabia direccion del partido y lider para materializar cabalmente la tesis arriba mencionada.
					
					  Los Generalisimos condujeron con dinamismo la campana para elevar el nivel cultural de los campesinos y convertir el campo en el cultural socialista civilizado y confortable.
					
					  Gracias a la sabia direccion del partido y lider se materializaron cabalmente el espiritu y el metodo Chongsanri en la direccion sobre la economia rural y se establecio el sistema de que el Comite de Gestion de Granjas Cooperativas del Distrito dirige las granjas cooperativas con el  metodo empresarial y en lo cientifico y tecnico.
					
					  La idea del Presidente y el Dirigente sobre la construccion rural socialista y sus hazanas se llevan adelante por la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					  El Mariscal fijo la agricultura como sector principal de la campana para construir la potencia economica y mejorar la vida del pueblo y con su direccion energica hizo registrar nuevo salto e innovaciones en la rama agricola.
					
					  El informante subrayo la necesidad de materializar cabalmente el mensaje del Mariscal enviado a los participantes en la Conferencia Nacional de Jefes de Equipo del Sector Agricola "Renovemos la produccion agricola con la bandera de la tesis rural socialista en alto" y lograr el nuevo avance en resolver definitivamente el problema rural.

articles.title: Efectuado el pleno ampliado del CC de UPC
articles.content:
Efectuado el pleno ampliado del CC de UPC
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 27 en esta capital el pleno ampliado del Comite Central de la Union de Periodistas de Corea.
					A la reunion asistieron el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Kim Ki Nam, los miembros del CC de la UPC, los funcionarios directivos, periodistas y redactores de los organos capitalinos y locales de prensa e informacion.
					
					En la ocasion se discutio el problema de hacer que los periodistas y hombres de la prensa cumplan con su mision de trompeteros de marcha destinada a levantar una oleada de saltos en todos los dominios de la construccion de un Estado prospero a traves de la ofensiva ideologica revolucionaria.
					
					El presidente del CC de la UPC, Cha Sung Su, presento el informe y otras personas intervinieron.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que el discurso del Mariscal Kim Jong Un en la VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del PTC es el gran programa a ser tomado con firmeza por los periodistas y hombres de la prensa y es el medio omnipotente que asegura la victoria de la revolucion coreana con el poderio de ideologia.
					
					Dieron enfasis en que bien conscientes de la voluntad del Mariscal de anticipar la victoria final de la revolucion ateniendose mas a la teoria ideologica del Juche, arma poderosa, deben intensificar los quehaceres del sector de prensa e informacion y librar la batalla de prensa, propaganda y agitacion.
					
					En el pleno ampliado quedo aprobada una resolucion.

articles.title: ACNC publica comentario sobre "informe" de "comite de investigacion" de ONU
articles.content:
ACNC publica comentario sobre "informe" de "comite de investigacion" de ONU
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ACNC) -- Publico recientemente un "informe" el "comite de investigacion" sobre la situacion de derechos humanos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fabricado en el Consejo de DDHH de la ONU. 
					Al igual que los otros publicados anteriormente, es un documento falsificado que hace vista gorda de la verdadera situacion de DDHH del pueblo coreano y se basa en los infundados datos brindados por algunos "fugitivos" y criminales profugos norcoreanos. 
					
					Por eso, muchos paises y hasta los medios del Occidente dicen con preocupacion como fue posible que ese informe parcial haya sido circulado como documento oficial de un aparato de la ONU.
					
					En su articulo "invento de la ONU", la revista online rusa Tibilrus senala que ese documento se habra elaborado por un pedido y agrega que el problema es por que la ONU rebaja su autoridad distribuyendo como "informe" tales datos absurdos e inciertos.
					
					Lo sospechoso es que el "informe" fue publicado cuando la RPDC realiza esfuerzos inauditos por mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y lograr la reunificacion del pais dividido en dos partes. 
					
					El especialista del Instituto de Estudios Estrategicos de Francia, Jean-Vincent Brisset, dijo en entrevista con el periodico La Croix que no se puede reconocer el "informe" porque carece de confirmacion y es documento infundado y no cientifico. 
					
					Apunto que el "informe" debe revelar, por el contrario, como EE.UU. practico durante varios decenios la politica hostil a la RPDC y como invalido los exitos alcanzados por ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					La vicepresidenta del Partido de Patria Libre de Brasil, Rosanita Campos, hizo publica en el rotativo Hora do Povo el articulo intitulado "Sirviente de Obama inventa el informe nazista contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea". 
					
					El articulo transmite que nadie sabe quien es Michael Kirby, quien suele a declarar de repente a los medios de prensa pagados y monopolicos de varios paises para la demagogia contra la Corea socialista. 
					
					Parece que Michael Kirby es el presidente de un comite de la ONU encargado de los asuntos coreanos que actua bajo el mando de EE.UU., critica y agrega que su mision es inventar las "pruebas" contra la RPDC a peticion de Washington y servir en la cooperacion internacional manipulada por EE.UU. 
					
					Prosigue que el nunca ha visitado a Pyongyang ni conversado con los representantes del gobierno de la RPDC, sino fue invitado en varias ocasiones por Seul, que dispone de todas las estructuras capaces de fabricar las "pruebas" necesarias a la fabricacion del "informe" fraudulento a traves de las entrevistas con algunos surcoreanos y "fugitivos norcoreanos". 
					
					La interpretacion al estilo nazista de Michael Kirby sobre la RPDC persigue manchar la imagen de la Corea socialista como Estado nazis violador de DDHH y acusarla a la Corte Penal Internacional que sirve para los intereses politicos de EE.UU. y sus aliados, denuncia. 
					
					Los datos arriba mencionados evidencian una vez mas que el presente "informe" resulta una provocacion politica para derrocar el regimen norcoreano al manchar su prestigio en la arena internacional e intensificar el grado de presion, siendo producto de los actos hostiles cometidos durante varios decenios por EE.UU.
					
					EE.UU. es el peor violador de DDHH que con su agresion e intervencion asesina a las personas inocentes y causa incontables desastres por doquier del mundo. 
					
					Viola flagrantemente los derechos humanos en los Estados soberanos como Iraq, Libia, Afganistan, Pakistan, en particular, en Siria y otros paises independientes. 
					
					Instalo carceles en Guantanamo y otros rincones del orbe donde son maltratados los prisioneros. 
					
					La sociedad estadounidense es infierno de DDHH donde se cometen las escuchas ilegales y la vigilancia ilicita. 
					
					Pues, es ilogico y ridiculo que EE.UU. cuestione la situacion de "DDHH" de alguien. 
					
					EE.UU. es el peor violador de DDHH del mundo que ya debio ser acusado a la Corte Penal Internacional. 
					
					Todos los militares y civiles coreanos no toleraran jamas tales actos asquerosos de los que habituados al veto al socialismo coreano centrado en las masas populares, calumnian la dignidad y el sistema de la RPDC. 
					
					Sera condenado duro por la historia el intento ridiculo de las fuerzas hostiles de utilizar el tema de DDHH en su malsano objetivo politico, violar la soberania de la RPDC y derrocar su regimen socialista.
